string.value: The Rememberer sure would know who Bob is. He's the Rememberer! I should talk with The Rememberer to find out what he knows.
The Rememberer isn't relly being helpful today. Very slow talking, not really informative. I wonder why he is so... depres
He is MEAN! MEAN, MEAN, MEAN! He took away Bob's Snail Shell from me wtihout me letting him! Now, what do I have to do?

... what brings you here...?

#L0##bNothing. Just passing by.#k#l
#L1##bSince you are the rememberer, I thought you might know something about this snail. Bob.#k#l
... Bob? If you mean Bob Snale, I've seen him before..\r\n\r\n#L0##bIs this snail the right one?#k#l

Yes... This snail is the snail I saw crawling toward the dungeon through sleepywood long time ago. People called him Bob... Ages have passed since then but it looks like the only thing that has changed is the number of scratches on his shell...\r\n\r\n#L0##bOk, that's all I needed to know. Thanks.#k#l

Wait... If you don't mind, can I hold him for a second...?

#L0##bSure, go ahead.#k#l
#L1##bHmm? No, I think I'd better not.#k#l
Thanks. Let me get a good look at him...
HA! HA! HA! I finally have him on my collection. Leave now if you aren't here to hunt monsters.

Why aren't you leaving? I am the Rememberer who counts up the monsters you kill and give reward to. What do you expect for me to act toward monsters? Also, this one is the legendary being. I've always been waiting for the moment I have him on my hands. Bye, bye. And come back if you are here to hunt monsters.
I will be waiting for you...
